definition: pleasant to hear
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Mr Qin is our history teacher. He has a wonderful name Qin Han.
sentences.chinese: 秦先生是我們的歷史老師，他有一個好聽的名字秦漢。

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 別對我說好聽的，我要見你的行動。

sentences.english: Below gave everyone a good feeling villages light rock song.
sentences.chinese: 下面送給大家一首好聽的鄉村輕搖滾感覺的歌。

sentences.english: And when I am on-air, I play music that sounds good.
sentences.chinese: 當我在廣播裏的時候，我播放好聽的音樂。

sentences.english: Women Current in the video singing a little tune, sound beautiful, good to hear.
sentences.chinese: 一次女流在視頻裏唱的小調子，音質很美，很好聽。

sentences.english: When it rained, funny sounds came from the splashing raindrop on the butterbur leaf.
sentences.chinese: 下雨了，雨點濺在款冬葉子上發出好聽的聲音。

sentences.english: Plant category, name orphean dot, to several meat plants.
sentences.chinese: 植物類中，名字好聽點的，要數肉植物了。

sentences.english: Generally, the sound of an announcer is euphonic.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，播音員的聲音都很好聽。

sentences.english: His glib talk sounds as sweet as a song.
Her words sound a little retroflex, they are quite pleasant to hear.
sentences.chinese: 她說話有點兒捲舌，挺好聽的。

sentences.english: A singer-XuSong, he is very cool and his song is very well.
sentences.chinese: 一個歌手叫許嵩，他很帥他的歌也很好聽。

sentences.english: What and affection are concerned Orphean net name?
sentences.chinese: 有什麼與情感有關又好聽的網名？

sentences.english: Good to hear an English song, very lyrical, good sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 挺好聽的一首英文歌，很抒情，音質不錯。

sentences.english: He can't sing as well as you.
